forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.passwordChangedMessage: Password changed successfully. Please log in again with your new password.
changePassword.passwordRequirements: Your password should contain at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 special character, and 1 digit.
